mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.pid AS "p.id", a.no AS "no", a.site_id AS "site.id", a.file_id AS "file.id", a.start_date AS "startdate", a.end_date AS "enddate", a.status AS "status", a.remarks AS "remarks", site.name AS "site.name", file.name AS "file.name"
LEFT JOIN base_site site ON site.id = a.site_id LEFT JOIN business_file_manger file ON file.id = a.file_id
mapper.select:
select count(*) from business_route a LEFT JOIN business_file_manger file ON file.id = a.file_id where a.status = '下发' and (now() between a.start_date and a.end_date) and a.site_id = #{siteid}
and file.name like concat('%',#{filename},'%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO business_route( create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, pid, no, site_id, file_id, start_date, end_date, status, remarks ) VALUES ( #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{p.id}, #{no}, #{site.id}, #{file.id}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{status}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE business_route SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, pid = #{p.id}, no = #{no}, site_id = #{site.id}, file_id = #{file.id}, start_date = #{startdate}, end_date = #{enddate}, status = #{status}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
